about.title: About
about.subtitle: A fast, secure, and transparent experience for reservations, delivery, and QR menu orders.
about.headline: Discover, order, and pay with confidence — all in Rezvix.
about.description: Rezvix brings reservations, delivery orders, and the QR menu experience into one place. It supports online payments (Stripe) and pay-at-door options, plus location-based discovery and real-time notifications.

smartBooking.title: Smart booking & ordering
smartBooking.desc: Create reservations and delivery orders quickly with date, time, party size, and address details.

deposit.title: Payment options
deposit.desc: Online payment via Stripe or pay-at-door with card/cash for flexible and secure checkout.

qr.title: QR menu & instant orders
qr.desc: Order from the QR menu on-site, choose a payment method, and send your order instantly.

transparency.title: Real-time status & alerts
transparency.desc: Track order, delivery, and reservation updates with timely notifications.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Reach us about reservations, delivery, QR menu, or payments.
contact.emailDesc: You can send us an email for any questions, feedback, or support requests.
contact.moreInfoDesc: Soon you will find more information and additional support channels about Rezvix right here.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: You can permanently delete your Rezvix account and related data.
deleteAccount.descriptionMain: When you delete your account, your reservation history and personal data will be removed permanently. Please make sure you have saved any important information before continuing.
deleteAccount.dataItemReservations: Your past and upcoming reservation records
deleteAccount.dataItemProfile: Your profile details and communication preferences
deleteAccount.dataItemAnalytics: Usage data that can be linked to your profile
deleteAccount.warningText: After your account is deleted, you will need to create a new account to sign in again with the same email address.
deleteAccount.successMessage: Your account and personal data have been successfully deleted.
deleteAccount.errorGeneric: An error occurred while deleting your account.

helpSupport.title: Help & Support
helpSupport.subtitle: Quickly review the most common questions about delivery, QR menu, payments and notifications.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We have collected the most common topics for you.
faq.q1: How do I place a delivery order or make a reservation?
faq.q2: How do I order using the QR menu?
faq.q3: Payment failed or the payment screen won’t open. What should I do?
faq.q4: Why do you need location and notification permissions?
faq.a1: Choose a restaurant and enter date, time, and party size for reservations. For delivery, select your address, build your cart, and confirm the order.
faq.a2: Scan the QR code at the venue, pick your items from the menu, choose a payment method, and send your order.
faq.a3: Check your internet connection, update the app, and try again. Online payments are processed securely by Stripe; Rezvix does not store card details.
faq.a4: Location helps show nearby venues and improves delivery address selection. Notifications keep you updated on order and delivery status.

tips.title: Quick Tips
tips.subtitle: Check these steps first to avoid most issues.
tips.item1: Make sure location and notification permissions are enabled.
tips.item2: Ensure you are using the latest version of the Rezvix app.
tips.item3: If payment or ordering issues persist, try restarting the app.

contact.title: Still need help?
contact.subtitle: You can reach out to us anytime. We’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

licenses.title: Open Source Licenses
licenses.subtitle: Rezvix relies on many open source libraries for performance, security and a smooth user experience.

section.overviewBody1: Rezvix is built on top of modern web and mobile open source libraries. These projects help us ship faster while keeping performance and security standards high.
section.overviewBody2: Below is a grouped overview of some of the main libraries used in the app and their license types. For full license texts, please refer to each project’s GitHub repository.
section.noteBody1: This list summarizes the most frequently used core libraries in the project. There may be additional helper packages and development tools in use.
section.noteBody2: All libraries are used in accordance with their own license terms. We respect the work of the maintainers and are grateful to the open source community.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Below you can find details about how Rezvix collects, uses and protects your data.
privacy.collected_id: Identity and contact details (name, email, phone) and delivery addresses
privacy.collected_usage: Reservation, delivery and QR menu order details; payment preferences
privacy.collected_device: Device/session information, push token and location data when permitted
privacy.usage_reservation: To manage reservations, delivery orders and QR menu orders
privacy.usage_notifications: To send order, payment and delivery updates
privacy.usage_security: To improve security, prevent fraud and meet legal obligations
privacy.sharing_restaurants: Order and reservation data may be shared with relevant restaurants
privacy.sharing_law: Payment processing may involve trusted providers (e.g., Stripe) and legal obligations
privacy.retention_text: Your data is stored only as long as necessary for operational, legal and security requirements.
privacy.rights_text: You may request access, correction or deletion of your personal data at any time.
privacy.cookies_text: Rezvix uses essential cookies to improve performance and personalize your experience.
privacy.contact_text: You can contact us for any questions, feedback, or requests regarding our privacy policy.
privacy.disclaimer: This privacy policy may be updated periodically to improve transparency and compliance.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: By using Rezvix, you agree to the following terms covering reservations, delivery and payments.
terms.accountText: You are responsible for keeping your account secure and your login details confidential. Any activity carried out via your account is deemed to be your responsibility. We recommend that you do not share your password with third parties.
terms.reservationsTitle: Reservations, Delivery and QR Menu Orders
terms.reservationsText1: Reservations and delivery orders are created based on date/time, party size/address and restaurant policies. Some venues may require online payment, minimum order value or pay-at-door options.
terms.reservationsText2: For QR menu and delivery orders, accurate table/address details are the user’s responsibility. Cancellation and modification rights are defined by each restaurant’s policy.
terms.prohibitedText: You may not use Rezvix for fraudulent, misleading, abusive or illegal purposes. Creating fake orders, payment fraud or location manipulation may result in permanent suspension of your account.
terms.liabilityText: Rezvix is not directly responsible for the content, quality or delivery of services offered by restaurants. Online payments are processed by trusted providers (Stripe); card details are not stored by Rezvix.
terms.changesText: These terms may be updated from time to time. Changes take effect as soon as they are published within the app. Your continued use of Rezvix after changes have been published constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
terms.legalText1: This text is for general information only and does not constitute legal advice. You are expected to comply with all applicable local laws and regulations while using the app.
terms.legalText2: If you have any legal or contract-related questions about Rezvix, please reach out to us via the Contact screen.
terms.disclaimer: *This text is for informational purposes only and does not replace professional legal advice.
